summary:
2 augustus 2022

The experience of over 35 years of teaching and still being interested in every individual who is taking a course makes me succesful in everything I do: 

* Lessons and courses Dutch and English
* Dutch for non-native Dutch speakers (NT2)
* Tailor-made courses
* Extra help for people with problems like Autism, ADHD, etc.)


Specialties: My specialty is that I can work with all kinds of people. Thus far I have been successful teaching: secondary school pupils at various intellectual levels, pupils who need special care, athletics coaches and employees of all kinds of companies.

I can adapt every course or tailor-make a new one so that it meets the needs of the participants. Courses can contain elements to improve communicative, didactic and pedagogic skills.

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Language Centre University Maastricht', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maastricht', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Language Centre University Maastricht', 'description': None, 'title': 'NT2 and English teacher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Geleen', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geleen', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Geleen', 'description': 'Versatility and flexibility are two of my characteristics. I do a lot of different things. I teach tailor-made courses for English, and Dutch as a second language (NT2). 

For the Atletiek Unie I teach athletics coaches. I teach them how to train children aged between 6 and 18. Technical elements as well as pedagogic and didactic elements are part of the course.

A group of disabled persons who want to improve their didactic and pedagogic qualities were trained by me for over four years. The disabled work together in a group called GIPS (Gehandicapten Informatie Project Scholen) and visit schools (GIPS Spelen & Leren) and companies and organisations (GIPS Training & Advies). Their goal is that they will be treated as people and not as disabled. They want to teach the others that they can speak for themselves and that they will ask for help if they need it. I help them making interactive programmes they use to reach their goal.', 'title': 'Free lance teacher/trainer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Horizon Interlingua', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Limburg and south of Brabant', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Horizon Interlingua', 'description': None, 'title': 'English and NT2 teacher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Eysenhegge', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 1985}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sittard', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 1985}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}}, 'company': 'Eysenhegge', 'description': 'Taught Dutch and English to pupils who were either cognitively impaired or hard to educate because of problems like autism and ADHD.', 'title': 'Teacher Dutch and English', 'employment_type': None}]}]
